title: A2A Protocol Official Schema (Subset)
description: Subset of the official A2A Protocol schema focusing on AgentCard structure

AgentCapabilities.description: Defines optional capabilities supported by an agent

streaming.description: Indicates if the agent supports Server-Sent Events (SSE) for streaming responses

pushNotifications.description: Indicates if the agent supports sending push notifications for asynchronous task updates

stateTransitionHistory.description: Indicates if the agent provides a history of state transitions for a task

extensions.description: A list of protocol extensions supported by the agent

AgentProvider.description: Information about the agent's service provider

organization.description: The name of the organization providing the agent

url.description: The URL of the organization's website

AgentSkill.description: Represents a specific capability or function the agent can perform

id.description: A unique identifier for the skill

name.description: A human-readable name for the skill

description.description: A detailed description of what the skill does

tags.description: Tags for categorizing and discovering the skill

examples.description: Example prompts or inputs that would trigger this skill

inputModes.description: Supported input MIME types for this skill

outputModes.description: Supported output MIME types for this skill

security.description: Security requirements specific to this skill

AgentCard.description: The AgentCard is a self-describing manifest for an agent per A2A Protocol specification

protocolVersion.description: The version of the A2A protocol this agent supports

name.description: A human-readable name for the agent

description.description: A human-readable description of the agent's purpose
examples: Agent that helps users with recipes and cooking

url.description: The preferred endpoint URL for interacting with the agent

capabilities.description: A declaration of optional capabilities supported by the agent

skills.description: The set of skills or distinct capabilities the agent can perform

defaultInputModes.description: Default set of supported input MIME types for all skills

defaultOutputModes.description: Default set of supported output MIME types for all skills

provider.description: Information about the agent's service provider

preferredTransport.description: The transport protocol for the preferred endpoint

documentationUrl.description: An optional URL to the agent's documentation

iconUrl.description: An optional URL to an icon for the agent

securitySchemes.description: A declaration of the security schemes available to authorize requests

security.description: A list of security requirement objects that apply to all agent interactions

supportsAuthenticatedExtendedCard.description: Indicates if the agent supports returning an extended card with authentication

signatures.description: Digital signatures for verifying the agent card's authenticity

metadata.description: Optional extension field for custom metadata
